## ğŸ”„ Implementation Plan

### Phase 1: Architecture Review (Agent-2)
- Review SEO code structure and best practices
- Validate Schema.org implementation
- Check meta tag completeness
- Verify deployment method compatibility

### Phase 2: Deployment (Agent-7)
- Deploy SEO PHP files to WordPress functions.php
- Alternative: Create WordPress plugin for each site
- Verify deployment via WordPress REST API or SFTP
- Test meta tags appear in page source

### Phase 3: Verification (Agent-7 + Agent-2)
- Verify meta tags in page source
- Test with Google Rich Results Test
- Validate Open Graph with Facebook Debugger
- Check Twitter Card preview
- Verify Schema.org with Google's Structured Data Testing Tool
